sentences: Tõlkis Mart Saar metsade kõnet laulude keelde.
Tõlkijat paluti tõlkida see dokument saksa keelde.
context: The word 'tõlkis' is the past tense third person singular form of the Estonian verb 'tõlkima', which means 'to translate'. It refers to the action of converting text or speech from one language to another. In context, it can also refer to a translator or interpreter.
